about_the_game:
Leave hope at the door of Dante's hell and plunge into the deep abyss of Gehenne. Will you have the courage to defeat Gluttony's teratological hordes, and will you be able to survive in the foul cesspool of viscous entrails that serves as his macabre sanctuary?

DECIDIT is a fast-paced roguelike FPS in which you must use all the arsenal and movement skills at your disposal to progress through an unstable pandemonic maze. Steal mutations from the creatures you face, modify your weapons and abilities, and use them synergistically to create the most devastating combos to pulverize your enemies. Each run is unique, and the difficulty modes on offer are sure to challenge every type of player.

DECIDIT is a student project made by nine passionate devs in one year as a graduation project.

DECIDIT won the excellence award and was finalist at the Rookie Awards 2024 under the Game Of The Year category and was Finalist at the Flip Festival 2024.

content_descriptors.notes: You shoot monsters, there is blood splashes and some rooms are covered with semi-realistic bloody flesh/organs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Decidit is a fast FPS roguelike in which you must use all the arsenal and movement abilities at your disposal in order to progress in an unstable demonic maze. Be fast, precise but also strategic using all the demonic weapons and abilities collected on the way to create powerful synergies.
